name: Fungal Colony Sim
description:
You are but a humble Mushroom farmer. You feel the need to farm mushrooms. But there is a voice calling to you. Something from deep under the farm. You must grow mushrooms.

CONTROLS: CLICK ON MUSHROOMS

This is a WIP and if there is enough interest I'll keep adding to it. I have a whole list of things I wasn't able to get in before the deadline.

Made for a YouTube video in which I only have six days to make a game (Link available when the video is done lol)
